short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide 'Play on TV' button on YouTube video player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide 'Play on TV' button on YouTube video player.

You can prevent the mistake of accidentally clicking the button to share the screen.

You can adjust the function using the toggle button in
chrome://extensions
